title: A Hnathawh Dan - Orbital Temple
heading: A Hnathawh Dan
intro: Orbital Temple project hi thil pathum inzawmkhawm a ni a, chungte chuan space-a temple hming thawn turin an thawk ho a ni.
paragraph1: Satellite hian khawvel hi km 525 vel a sangah a vel a, a hmingte chu a memory-ah a dah khawm a ni. Ground station-te chuan satellite hi a pass lai hian an inbiak a, website kaltlangin miten hming an thehluh tawhte chu an thawn chhuak á¹­hin.
paragraph2: Hming i submit chuan queue pakhatah a join a, pass awm leh tur chhungin satellite-ah a thawn chhuak ang. Orbital Temple-a i hming hlawhtling taka upload a nih hunah email confirmation i dawng ang.
imageAlt: Orbital Temple System Diagram hmanga siam a ni
